title: Hotel VIU Milan: Italian City Escape
description: Immerse yourself in Italy’s fashion capital with a three-night stay at Hotel VIU Milan - located in trendy Porta Volta. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, evening cocktails served on the rooftop terrace and a 10% dining discount to the onsite restaurant led by Michelin-starred chef Giancarlo Morelli for two adults.
offer_address: Via Aristotile Fioravanti, 6, 20154 Milano MI, Italy

title: Modern Milan Elegance near Historic City Centre with Daily Breakfast & EUR50 Dining Credit
description:
Located close to Milan's historic centre and a stone's throw from the upscale CityLife district, this modern hotel invites you to explore The Fashion Capital from a luxurious base. Just steps from the Lotto Metro Station, the hotel offers convenient access to the city's iconic landmarks, including the Duomo di Milano and the Basilica of Santa Maria delle Grazie, home to Da Vinci's 'The Last Supper'.

Start or end your days at MaMì Restaurant, a contemporary take on Milanese cuisine with a lavish breakfast buffet and stunning cocktails by the hotels' own daring cocktail masters. For a midday pause, Elyxr Café delivers the espresso Milan deserves.

title: Extended by Popular Demand: Melia Retreat in the Heart of Milan with Daily Breakfast, Dining Credit & Rooftop Terrace
description:
Get ready for next-level luxury at this Milan retreat where comfort and style are given a whole new meaning. Cloud-like bedding, refined elegance and floor-to-ceiling windows set the stage for a sophisticated Italian stay. From a chic rooftop bar with sweeping city views to spa-like bathrooms made for pampering, every detail is designed to spoil you.

Step outside and Milan's best spots are at your doorstep. You're minutes from the trendy Brera district and a short metro ride from Navigli's charming canalside cafes and bars. Whether you're people-watching with a cappuccino or soaking up the fashion capital's deep-rooted heritage and lively night scene, there's never a dull moment.

title: Grand Opening: Boutique Milan Elegance with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & EUR50 Hotel Credit
description:
Fresh on the Milan scene for 2025, Palazzo Buenos Aires brings bold, boutique charm to the Loreto district, arguably the city's coolest corner. Think crisp, contemporary interiors with a nod to 1930s elegance - sleek lines, soft lighting and impeccable taste. It's the kind of place that feels effortlessly exclusive, offering design-led rooms, a refined lobby lounge and sun-dappled outdoor terrace for morning espressos.

Perched right on Milan's shopping boulevard Corso Buenos Aires, you're just steps from retail therapy heaven. The hotel's breakfast sets you up for urban discovery, while Loreto's Art Nouveau architecture - with its graceful facades, ornate metalwork and early‑20th‑century flourishes - adds charm to every stroll. Palazzo Buenos Aires places you in the very flow of Milanese life.

title: OLD - Five-Star Luxury in the Heart of Milan
description: Immerse yourself in Italy’s fashion capital with a three-night stay at Hotel VIU Milan - located in trendy Porta Volta. Enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, evening cocktails served on Milan’s only rooftop terrace and a 10% dining discount to the onsite restaurant led by Michelin starred chef Giancarlo Morelli for two.
offer_address: Via Aristotile Fioravanti, 6, 20154 Milano MI, Italy

title: Elegant Italian Escape 15 Minutes from Milan Cathedral with Daily Breakfast
description:
Immerse yourself in Milan's rich history with a stay at this contemporary hotel, which mixes old-school Italian charm with modern flair. Whether you're enjoying the home comforts of your elegant room, chilling in the common spaces or devouring top-tier local food at surrounding restaurants, you're in for a treat.

A stay at Palazzo Viridis puts you in the thick of Milan's fashion scene. Art lovers can hop over to Brera, while shopaholics will love being near to Via Monte Napoleone's designer stores. Plus, getting around the rest of Milan is a breeze with great transport links right on your doorstep.
offer_address: Corso di Porta Vittoria 51, Milan 20122, Italy

title: Sophisticated City Glamour in the Heart of Milan with Rooftop Bar & Daily Breakfast
description:
Get ready for next-level luxury at this ultra-chic Milan retreat where comfort and style are given a whole new meaning. Cloud-like bedding, refined elegance and floor-to-ceiling windows set the stage for a sophisticated Italian escape. From a chic rooftop bar with sweeping city views to an oh-so-elegant authentic steakhouse, every detail is designed to invite indulgence.

Step outside and Milan's best spots are at your doorstep. You're minutes from the trendy Brera district and a short metro ride from Navigli's charming canalside cafes and bars. Whether you're people-watching with a cappuccino or soaking up the fashion capital's deep-rooted heritage and lively night scene, there's never a dull moment.

title: Elegant Milan Retreat within Italy's Fashion Capital
description: Live your Italian dream and step into a world of fashion, culture and gourmet cuisine at Crowne Plaza Milan - Linate, an IHG Hotel. A fast-paced metropolis home to some of the world's most influential fashion houses, Milan allows you to indulge in opulent retail therapy, dine in Michelin-starred restaurants and wander through amazing sights that encapsulate the city's rich history. Shop 'til you drop, then return to the hotel and sip mouthwatering Italian wines at the onsite Il Giardino restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Milan - Linate, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Via K. Adenauer, 3, 20097 San Donato Milanese, Milano MI, Italy

title: Stylish Milan Hotel in Italian Fashion Capital
description: Fall in love with the voco Milan-Fiere, an IHG Hotel, a stylish and vibrant escape in the heart of Italy's fashion capital. Savour sumptuous dishes at OnFire Grill and Lounge, let your hair down at Ludico bar and gaming area for some cool competition and cooler cocktails or revitalise after a long soak in the Turkish baths at the wellness centre. As the sun sets, retire to a cosy and welcoming room for a good night's sleep or hit the streets of Milan to experience the dynamic nightlife.
location_description: voco Milan - Fiere, an IHG Hotel

title: Boutique Milan Designer Suites in Renowned Navigli District
description:
Experience high-end opulence and refreshing indulgence at the boutique Aethos Milan. Ideally located in the heart of Milan, within walking distance of the Columns of St. Lawrence, Arco di Porta Ticinese and Navigli Milano, Aethos Milan offers an eclectic mix of artistic elegance and modern comforts, while maintaining impeccable hospitality and authentic Italian style. 

Each of its picturesque suites offers an industrial aesthetic softened by swathes of warm orange and yellow and handpicked design features. Inside, guests can whet their appetite with tantalizing classic Italian flavors at ZAÏA Restaurant, or settle in with a reinvented cocktail at The Doping Bar - known for its dynamic menu featuring local herbs, botanicals and homemade spirits. Once you've had your fill, hit the city streets and visit the iconic sites nearby, or hop on a train at Milano Centrale Railway Station to explore further afield.
offer_address: Piazza Ventiquattro Maggio, 8, 20123 Milano MI, Italy

title: Sophisticated Fashion Capital Escape in the Heart of Milan
description: Find yourself in the heart of the fashion capital with an escape to the sophisticated Crowne Plaza Milan City, an IHG Hotel. Positioned in the heart of this thriving Italian metropolis, you'll have food, fashion and culture at your fingertips. Positioned just steps from Milano Centrale Railway Station, use this hotel as your launchpad for discovering the cobblestone streets, Michelin Star restaurants and art that encapsulates this city's beauty.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Milan City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Via Melchiorre Gioia 73, Milan, Lombardy 20124, Italy

title: Elegant Escape in the Heart of Milan
description: Experience world-class luxury from Italy’s ultimate fashion runway, with a stay in the boutique Hotel Indigo Milan - Corso Monforte, an IHG Hotel. Set in a prestigious 19th-century building, this hotel is a historic masterpiece in architectural and interior design. Lose yourself in the beauty of the city as you live out the perfect European fantasy, wandering ancient cobblestone streets, indulging in luxurious high-end shopping, and gazing upon magnificent historic monuments.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Milan - Corso Monforte, an IHG Hotel

title: Milan Heritage Luxury with Rooftop Terrace near Iconic Duomo Cathedral
description:
Stay within arm's reach of Milan's iconic cathedral at The Square Milano Duomo, a glamorous hotel that is part of the prestigious Dei Cavalieri hotels collection. Golden touches, gleaming surfaces and Versace vases are just the beginning of this fashion-forward, quintessentially 'Milan' hotel. In between exploring the city's sights, dine in at Arya restaurant, serving authentic Italian cuisine with a modern twist. During the summer months, you can also dine on the 10th-floor rooftop terrace and be wowed by sprawling city views.

Located in an elegant 1940s building, near the iconic Duomo di Milano cathedral, the hotel is perfectly placed for travellers looking to explore the city's must-see sights, and mouthwatering restaurants and bars.
offer_address: Via Alberico Albricci, 2/4, 20122 Milano MI, Italy
